title: Frontend Developer
name: Luke Charles
intro: Hello, I'm Luke 👋 Frontend Developer 🕸, Photographer 📷 and Golfer 🏌🏼.
description: With over 9 years experience as a Frontend Developer I’ve learnt that I love building inspiring and creative websites and products that aren’t just great to look at but also functional and accessible to all users.
I enjoy focusing on the details and ensuring sites are pixel perfect and working with designers to make sure their vision comes to life.
